channel.title: Posts on Sun Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Sun Notes

item.title: Designing and Implementing Dark Mode in Hugo
item.description: Recording the hurdles encountered while adding dark mode functionality to a website, as well as frontend display tips and implementation on Hugo.

item.title: SQL SCOPE_IDENTITY() and @@IDENTITY Differences in Retrieving Auto-Increment Values
item.description: Using SCOPE_IDENTITY() in SQL Server to Retrieve the Most Recently Insert Data and Comparing it with @@IDENTITY for Value Retrieval Differences.

item.title: JWT Authentication Mechanism Principles and Implementation Examples (C#)
item.description: JWT (JSON Web Token) is an open standard used for securely transmitting information between parties. JWT uses JSON objects to represent the messages to be transmitted and uses digital signatures or encryption to protect these messages.

item.title: Implementing Recommended Posts and Carousel Display in Hugo
item.description: Simple implementation of recommended posts list displayed in a carousel format.

item.title: Implementing Multiple Comment Sections in a Static Website Generated by Hugo
item.description: A Simple Implementation of Adding Multiple Comment Sections, with a Menu for Users to Choose their Preferred Commenting Method.

item.title: Valentine's Day Gift Idea: Marimo Moss Ball (Basic Introduction, Care Instructions, and Symbolic Meaning)
item.description: The Marimo moss ball is truly a plant for lazy people. It’s easy to care for, extremely therapeutic mentally, and has symbolic significance.

item.title: SQL-implement data partitioning (partition by)
item.description: Implement data partitioning using SQL partition by and compare the performance with LINQ.

item.title: C# Multi-threading principle, asynchronous usage and parameter with custom objects
item.description:
The principle of C# multi-threading, asynchronous usage and parameter with custom objects records.
None of the projects encountered so far have a hard requirement to use multi-threading. This article is to record my own understanding and learning process.

item.title: C# Enum Usage Record
item.description: C#-Enum (enumeration) uses and uses the extension method to obtain detailed description records.

item.title: SQL-merge into statement
item.description:
I was assigned to implement the function of synchronizing from different databases.
The company currently has an ERP system.
All data sources are based on this standard, so that customers can create , update, write to ERP,
and synchronize with ERP in their own systems…

item.title: Leetcode(Medium) 146. LRU Cache (Python)
item.description:
LRU Cache can be regarded as an interesting topic that I have encountered, and I feel that it is also a concept that will be used in many systems.
Unfortunately, I never encountered this problem on my job yet…

item.title: Cebu Residential Area Strolling
item.description: The record accidentally entered a local residential area (Cabantan Street) that is usually not dared to enter.

item.title: Cebu-Bohol island Day Tour (Tarsier + Chocolate Hills)
item.description: When I came to Cebu to study English, I didnâ€™t plan to travel to other islands at first, but I wanted to buy some textbooks in order to prepare for for IELTS. Since it is difficult to buy textbooks locally, I chose to order directly from the online platform. And my family will take the book for me from Taiwan and experience Cebu tourism by the way.

item.title: Philippines Jeepney + Cebu Theme Park Day Trip
item.description: Experienced the long-awaited Cebu common transportation Jeepney and the largest and newest theme park in Cebu : Anjo World Theme Park.

item.title: Cebu-Simala Church Day Trip
item.description: I was fortunate enough to visit the Simala Church, the largest church in Cebu. This article mainly records the itinerary planning at that time, the mass participation and the majestic architecture.

item.title: Christmas in Cebu
item.description: After December, the number of new students in language schools generally decreases, because most students need to go back to their hometown for New Yearâ€™s Eve, or come after the Lunar New Year. I am very happy to experience the local festive atmosphere during this time, but sometimes I still feel a little bit sad.ðŸ˜‚

item.title: Study tour in Cebu - Daily life Part 2
item.description: Jsut want to record the daily life of the language school and the environment of city when I lived in Cebu. My purpose at that time was increase english skills for interview, So there is no itinerary such as island hopping or nightlife.
